summary: My Workspace module (My Profile and My Reports pages) tested successfully. Both pages load correctly at their respective routes, display user data from backend APIs, and all interactive elements work as expected.

success_rate.backend: 100% - All employee hub APIs working (leave, permission, expenses, dashboard)
success_rate.frontend: 100% - Both My Profile and My Reports pages load and function correctly

seed_data_creation: Used existing test data from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: My Workspace module is fully functional. Routes /employee/profile and /employee/reports are working. Sidebar navigation shows both links under 'My Workspace' in Employee Hub section.

my_profile_page.user_info_displayed: PASS - Shows name, email, role, status, employee ID

tabs.leave_history: PASS - Shows leave records with status
tabs.permission_history: PASS - Tab clickable and shows data
tabs.expense_history: PASS - Shows expense records with amounts

features_verified: My Profile page loads correctly at /employee/profile
My Profile displays user information (name, email, department, designation, etc.)
My Profile Edit Profile button works and shows editable fields
My Profile Change Password functionality is accessible
My Reports page loads correctly at /employee/reports
My Reports shows summary stats (Leave Taken, Permissions, Expenses Claimed, Pending Requests)
My Reports displays tabbed interface with Leave History, Permission History, Expense History
My Reports fetches and displays actual employee data from backend APIs
Sidebar navigation shows My Reports and My Profile links under My Workspace
